$documentation.purpose: Registry of code review sessions and findings from multi-agent code review at Checkpoint 6. Tracks issues found by each specialized reviewer agent (bug-hunter, security-auditor, code-quality, test-coverage, contracts-reviewer, accessibility-auditor) with severity classification and resolution status.
$documentation.phase_position: Quality gate - validates code before integration testing

key_attributes.p0_blockers: Critical issues that must be fixed

severity_levels.critical: Blocks release - security vulnerabilities, data loss
severity_levels.high: Must fix before production - bugs, compliance issues
severity_levels.low: Nice to fix - style, minor improvements

validation_rules: No CRITICAL findings for PASSED status
PASSED_CONDITIONAL requires action plan for HIGH findings
Test coverage must be >= 80% for full pass
All P0 blockers must be resolved before CP7
